message.content:
cs.DC, cs.DS, cs.SY, cs.CR, cs.NI 

Reasoning: The paper deals with distributed systems, fault tolerance, and consensus algorithms, which are all topics typically found in the Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing (cs.DC) and Data Structures and Algorithms (cs.DS) sub-categories. The paper also mentions self-stabilisation, which is a topic in the Systems and Control (cs.SY) sub-category. The use of Byzantine fault tolerance suggests the Cryptography and Security (cs.CR) sub-category may also be relevant. Finally, the mention of message size suggests the Networking and Internet Architecture (cs.NI) sub-category may also be relevant.
